title: Firelily, New and Selected Poems
description: In her latest collection of poems, Giselle Steele has brought together new and selected poetry that speaks to the resilience of the human spirit after a devastating loss such as a wildfire. Highlighting the process that occurs with the fire lily flower that is known to grow from the ashes of ruins, it is her hope that with this collection each reader will be inspired to find their personal inner peace and hope for the future.
author: Giselle V. Steele
